title: The Chosen Place, The Timeless People
description: The chosen place is Bourneville, a remote, devastated part of a Caribbean island, the timeless people are its inhabitants -- black, poor, inextricably linked to the their past enslavement. The advance team for an ambitious American research project arrives, and the tense, ambivalent relationships that evolves -- between natives and foreigners, blacks and whites, haves and have-nots -- keenly dramatize the vicissitudes of power.Alternate cover for ISBN: 9780394726335
author: Paule Marshall
